description: A class to describe a contactable person or department in an organization.

Name.title: Contact. Name
Name.description: The name of this contact. It is recommended that this be used for a functional name and not a personal name.

Telephone.title: Contact. Telephone. Text
Telephone.description: The primary telephone number of this contact.

Telefax.title: Contact. Telefax. Text
Telefax.description: The primary fax number of this contact.

ElectronicMail.title: Contact. Electronic_ Mail. Text
ElectronicMail.description: The primary email address of this contact.
